roleset.name: to save or rescue

example.name: ARG1
example.text: In Hsia 's hands , all sorts of discarded objects , from sewing machines to camera lenses , are salvaged and put to good use .
example.arg: all sorts of discarded objects , from sewing machines to camera lenses

example.name: transitive
example.text: Noting that Sweden-2 wound up *-2 wasting state subsidies of about 35 billion Swedish kronor ( $ 5.47 billion [*U*]) during the 1970s in a vain attempt [* to salvage its shipbuilding industry , one analyst suggested that Mr. Suominen may have decided [*-3] to cut Finland 's losses once and for all .

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Majority Whip William Gray owes a political debt to Southern agriculture lawmakers for his rise in the House , and the Philadelphia Democrat used his position in the conference [*]to salvage the exemption from a total ban .

example.name: This sounds odd to me, but they are saving the leg from the need to be amputated.

roleset.note: SALVAGE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls steal-10.5. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from salvage.01-v)
SALVAGE-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to salvage.01-v. Salvage.01-v is a member of VN class steal-10.5-1. No FN class.Framed by Katie. (from salvage.01-n)
